description: This file defines a Python class 'Newspaper4kTools' that provides methods to extract article data from URLs using the 'newspaper' library. It includes methods for retrieving article metadata and content, with options to include summaries and limit article length.

classes.name: Newspaper4kTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for extracting article data from URLs, extending the 'Toolkit' base class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the Newspaper4kTools instance with options to read articles, include summaries, and limit article length.

methods.name: get_article_data
methods.description: Fetches article metadata such as title, authors, text, summary, and publish date from a URL.

methods.name: read_article
methods.description: Reads an article from a URL and returns its data as a JSON string, optionally truncated to a specified length.
